 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁדַף‎</span>] **verb** ==scorch, blight== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Niph\`al, Hithpa\`el ***be blighted***; Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁדַף‎</span> Ithpe\`el ***burn*** (up); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV. ***be dark***); — 

**Qal** ***Passive participle*** construct, of ears of grain, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁדוּפֹת קָדִים‎</span> [[Gen.41.6|Gen 41:6]] ***scorched by a sirocco, so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁדֻפוֺת ק‎</span> v[[Gen.41.23|Gen 41:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> v[[Gen.41.27|Gen 41:27]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]). ***
